extension.description: Telldus XBMC plugin, both USB sticks and Net devices are supported as well as local tdtool executable and Telldus Live!.[CR][CR]For a local tdtool binary, you will need to configure the path to the binary in the addon settings, while for Telldus Live! you will need to veryfy both keys and tokens to access your devices. To utilize the Telldus Live! devices, make sure you complete the entire setup process. For both options the Advanvced pane can be used to configure individual devices.[CR][CR]There is a limitation of 8 devices total; the first 8 returned is used upon automated setup. Look in the xbmc.log for excess devices and the advanced tab in the settings if you'd like to shuffle things around.[CR][CR]To use the program interface, use up/down to select the device, left/right to change value and press enter to apply. The design is intended to work with remotes.
